name: Kamen Rider: Battride War
description:
Kamen Rider: Battride War is an action game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It was originally released in 2013. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment. The game is rated as "Meh" on RAWG.
Kamen Rider: Battride War is available on PlayStation 3. The game is sold via PlayStation Store.
